alert.note: Alert for Ionia; Montcalm (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 10:17AM EDT until April 05 at 11:15AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ionia County in south central Michigan... Montcalm County in central Michigan... * Until 1115 AM EDT. * At 1017 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Lakeview to near Freeport, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ionia... Greenville... Portland... Stanton... Belding... Lake Odessa... Saranac... Edmore... Carson City... Lakeview... Orleans... Crystal... Sidney... Sebewa... Lyons... Sheridan... Muir... Mulliken... Pewamo... Hubbardston... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EDT for south central, central and southwestern Michigan. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EDT for south central, central and southwestern Michigan.
